resources.string: The view cities: allows the user to navigate between the list of cities and explores the hidden treasures in each of them
The view notifications: allows the admin to navigate between the list of cities and explores for each city the request sent by users to be validated

The view Map: allows the admin to navigate on the map and to explore the hidden treasures. The admin can then validates directly the user\'s request from this view, explores the hidden treasures validated, and adds new hidden treasures \n the initial position in the map is the current position of the admin got from the GPS
The view Map By City: allows the user to navigate on the map and explore the hidden treasures by choosing a city from the list of cities
